document.full_text: william hill, britain's biggest bookmaker, will move into the u.s. gaming market for the first time after agreeing to buy two american sports betting businesses for $39 million.
document.title: william hill to enter u.s. with $39 million deal
lines_and_colors: william hill, britain's biggest bookmaker, will move into the u.s. gaming market for the first time after agreeing to buy two american sports betting businesses for $39 million.
